attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Dihydrogen Monoxide is is a known causative component in many thousands of deaths and is a major contributor to millions upon millions of pounds of damage to property and the environment. Despite that, it continues to be used in a vast number of industrial processes and is readily available for purchase without any restrictions. It's time for something to be done about this situation.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
